name: Speed Flying Simulator
description:
Fly like a bird! Control a daredevil to get points for doing trick and flying close to the mountain landscape.

4 different mountains in 2 different environments, offering both summer speed riding and winter speed flying.

Featuring realistic wing gliding physics you and ideal speed parachute experience allowing you to fly close to the mountains .

Extreme points system that allows for scoring judged on speed, power, precision and loops.

Use standard touch controls or more your phone to control the adrenaline junkie.

Both first person and third person views are supported for both standard and virtual reality headset views.

Play Speed Flying Simulator now!
